apis.name: Echo Computer Agent API
apis.description: API for interacting with the Echo computer assistant agent.

response.description: Returns a `functions[]` array of FunctionDescription entries.

fields.name: message
fields.description: User command or query for the agent.

fields.name: inputs
fields.description: Optional inputs passed to the selected backend function.

fields.name: execute
fields.description: When true the agent executes the matched backend function.

fields.name: function
fields.description: Name of the function that handled the request.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Structured payload returned by the function handler.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Supplementary metadata describing the response context.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Summary of what the function does.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Additional metadata such as categories and examples.

apis.name: Echo Universal Verifier
apis.description: Deterministic FastAPI verifier that returns stable VC validation envelopes.

fields.name: credential
fields.description: Arbitrary credential payload evaluated by the stub.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Optional key/value map mirrored from typical verifier interfaces.

fields.name: ok
fields.description: Set to true when the credential is non-empty and the format is recognised.

fields.name: checks
fields.description: Static list of checks reported for downstream consumers.

fields.name: telemetry
fields.description: Includes the active cycle and policy profile for observability correlation.

notes: Instrumentation initialised with observability.configure_otel for OTLP traces, metrics, and logs.
Counters track request totals and failures while a histogram captures verification latency.
Middleware annotates spans with HTTP metadata so dashboards align with the agent chat API.
